alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 19 at 1:00AM PST until January 23 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Fresno-Clovis, Buttonwillow -Lost Hills -I5, Delano- Wasco-Shafter, Hanford -Corcoran -Lemoore, Visalia - Porterville -Reedley, Bakersfield, Southeast San Joaquin Valley and South End San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
